description.room: On the table is an elongated brown sack, smelling of hot peppers.
description.examine: The brown sack is an elongated brown sack, smelling of hot peppers.

description.room: There is a clove of garlic here.
There is a glass bottle here.
description.examine: The glass bottle contains a quantity of water.

description.room: There is a trophy case here.

description.examine: The rug is extremely beautiful and covers a trapdoor in the floor. Under the carpet you see a closed trapdoor.
The trapdoor is wooden and quite solid.

description.room: A battery-powered brass lantern is on the trophy case.
Above the trophy case hangs an elvish sword of great antiquity.
description.examine: The sword is an ancient elvish weapon. It glows faintly blue.

description.room: A large coil of rope is lying in the corner.
description.examine: A large coil of sturdy rope.

description.room: On a table is a nasty-looking knife.
description.examine: A nasty-looking knife. It looks sharp.
